ja535:7.3: Ariyamaggaṃ samārūha → ariyaṃ maggaṃ samāruha (bj, pts1) | ariyamaggaṃ samāruha (s2, s3)
ja535:18.1: Cando ca suriyo ca → sūriyo ca (mr)
ja535:19.1: Pāṇissarā mudiṅgā ca → mutiṅgā ca (bj, pts1)
ja535:21.1: suggatimāsamānā → suggatimāsasānā (bj, pts1) | sugatimāsasānā (s2, s3) | suggatāsisamānā (mr)
ja535:22.4: gamittha → apattha (bj, s2, s3) | apatthā'ti āha (pts1)
ja535:23.1: Addhā → addhā hi (s2, s3, pts1, c1)
ja535:24.4: udakaṃ pivāmi → udakampahaṃ pibe (bj) | udakaṃ pahaṃ piye (pts1)
ja535:35.1: sabbalokaccarito → sabbalokañcarako (bj, s2, s3) | sabbalokaṃ carako (pts1)
ja535:35.3: nobravi → no bravī (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja535:37.2: himavantapassani → himavantapasmani (bj, pts1, mr) | himavantapassini (s2, s3)
ja535:40.3: mama jātu cakkhubhi → jātacakkhuhi (bj, pts1) | jātacakkhubhi (s2, s3)
ja535:49.1: Sirāha → sirāhaṃ (bj, pts1), manujebhi → devī manujesu (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja535:63.1: manujehi → devī manujesu (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja535:65.3: Vinetvāna → vinetvā (bj, s2, s3, pts1), kulitthiyāsupi → kuladhītiyāsupi (bj, pts1)
ja535:68.1: Kālā → kāḷā (bj, s2, s3), aggijāriva → aggajātiva (bj) | aggijātiva (pts1)
ja535:74.2: Assatthanigrodhamadhukavetasā → ... madhukā ca vetasā (bj, pts1) | ... madhukā ca vedisā (s2, s3) | ... madhukavedisā (mr)
ja535:75.1: veḷukā → vephakā (bj) | velukā (s2, s3), keṇu → veṇu (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja535:75.4: ābhūjino ca → ābhujino ca (bj, s2, s3) | ābhujinopi (pts1)
ja535:76.1: Tassevuttarapassena → tassa ca uttare passe (bj, pts1) | tassa ca uttarapassena (s2, s3)
ja535:89.2: gavāssā → gavassā (s2, s3, pts1, c1), kikibyagghadīpiyo → kimpurisabyagghadīpiyo (s2, mr)
ja535:91.2: imāyo → dasa disā imā (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja535:91.3: vanappatiniñca → vanaspatīni ca (bj, pts1) | vanappatiñca (s2, s3, mr)
